item.title: vagranetes
item.description: vagranetes is a multi-node Kubernetes setup utilizing kubeadm within Vagrant virtual machines.

item.title: vagrant-kube
item.description: vagrant-kube is a Kubernetes single-node setup within a Vagrant virtual machine, designed to function as a local playground and testing environment for the latest Kubernetes version.
